00026 #ifndef __LOG_INTERNAL_H__
00027 #define __LOG_INTERNAL_H__

00030 #  include "config.h"
00031 #endif // HAVE_CONFIG_H
00032 
00033 #include <stdarg.h>
00034 
00035 // Internal methods so different platforms can route the logging
00036 // Offering both forms of the variadic function
00037 // These are implemented in the log_<platform> specific file
00038 void log_put_internal(const char *format, ...);
00039 void log_vput_internal(const char *format, va_list args);
00040
